00015 SYLPH_START_NAMESPACE(Core)
00016 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00017 template<typename T>
00018 interface Collection : public virtual Iterable<T>, public virtual Hashable {
00019     public:
00020 
00021     Collection() {
00022     }
00023 
00024     virtual ~Collection() {
00025     }
00026 
00027     virtual bool add(const T & t) = 0;
00028     virtual bool addAll(Collection<T> & c) = 0;
00029     virtual void clear() = 0;
00030     virtual bool contains(T & t) const = 0;
00031     virtual bool containsAll(Collection<T> & c) const = 0;
00032     virtual bool operator ==(Collection<T> & c) const = 0;
00033 
00034     virtual bool operator !=(Collection<T> & c) const {
00035         return !(*this == c);
00036     }
00037     virtual int hashCode() const = 0;
00038     virtual bool empty() const = 0;
00039     virtual bool remove(T & t) = 0;
00040     virtual bool removeAll(Collection<T> & c) = 0;
00041     virtual bool retainAll(Collection<T> & c) = 0;
00042     virtual std::size_t size() const = 0;
00043     virtual const Array<T> toArray() const = 0;
00044 
00045     virtual Iterator<T> iterator() const = 0;
00046     virtual MutableIterator<T> mutableIterator() = 0;
00047 
00048     operator Array<T>() const { return toArray(); }
00049 
00050 };
00051 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE(Core)
